_comment:
This JSON stores my timeline data, all with same format:
(academic_profile ->work_experience ->participations_achievements ->competitions_awards).

academic_profile.title: Universiti Sains Malaysia (USM), Penang
academic_profile.heading: CGPA: 3.77 | Bachelor of Computer Sciences (Intelligent Computing) with Honours

description.title: Core subjects:
description.content: Machine Learning and Computational Intelligence, Programming Methodology and Paradigms, Design & Analysis of Algorithms, Operating Systems, Database, Principles of Computer Networks and Information Security, Integrated Software Development Workshop.
Assisted the team in performing the following duties for events e.g. Undergraduate Graduation Ceremony, College Open Days, Students Exchange Programme:

points.title: Key Highlights:
content: Managed logistics, including VIP coordination, reviewing event procedures and delivering presentations.
Designed student's handbook and recorded meeting minutes.
Utilized Microsoft Excel, SharePoint, Word, and PowerPoint for documentation and team coordination.

points.title: Key Highlights:
content: Enhanced client satisfaction ratings by scheduling on-site service requests, managing show logistics and booth functionality need to meet demands.
Followed all policies, regulations, dress code and schedules.
Successfully communicated with all team members to navigate job duties and complete tasks.
Loaded, unloaded and moved material to and from storage and production areas.
Led a team of about 15 people across the academic year, coordinating tasks and ensuring cross-unit collaboration.
Supervised the progress and provided feedback to drive continuous improvement.
President of the History & Geography Club
President of the STEM Society (Science, Technology, Engineering, Mathematics)

competitions_awards.title: Top 10 Finalist | National Varsity Hackathon 2025 (V HACK 2025)

content: Second-runner up | KMJ e-Quizzery Science Carnival

competitions_awards.title: National Top 200 Finalist | National level IMU Virtual Science Discovery Challenge 2021 (SDC)
